florence.name: Florence
text: Ok, you guys don't have school any more, butâ€¦
That doesn't mean that you're on vacation!

Your teacher wrote me.
You have some homework to do.

kids.name: Maurice and Lea
text: But Mom, it's been so long since we've gone outside!
Can we go play in the park before, come on please? Pretty Pleeeeaaaaase.

choices.text: No, I already told you why we can't.

non-rangez.name: Florence
text: And you have to clean your room!

oui-rangez.name: Florence
text: But you first have to clean up your room.
